ARABIC: وَمَآ أَظُنُّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَآئِمَةً وَلَئِن رُّدِدتُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى لَأَجِدَنَّ خَيْرًا مِّنْهَا مُنقَلَبًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I do not think the Hour will ever come. But if I should be sent back to my Lord, I will definitely get something better in return.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Nor can I think that the Hour (of Doom) will come, And even if I am brought back to my Lord, I will surely find a better place there than this."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Nor do I believe that the Hour of Resurrection will ever come to pass. And even if I am returned to my Lord, I shall find a better place than this."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: nor do I think that there will be a Day of Judgment. Even if I shall be brought before my Lord, I certainly deserve to have a better place than this."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “I do not think that the Last Day will ever be established – and even if I return to my Lord I will surely find a haven better than this garden.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And I do not think the Hour will ever come, and if indeed I am brought back to my Lord, I surely, shall find better than this when I return to Him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And I do not think the hour will come, and even if I am returned to my Lord I will most certainly find a returning place better than this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: I do not think that the Hour is coming; and if I am indeed returned to my Lord, I shall surely find a better resort than this.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: I think not that the Hour will ever come, and if indeed I am brought back unto my Lord I surely shall find better than this as a resort.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and I do not believe that the Hour will ever come. Even if I am returned to my Lord, I shall surely find a better place than this."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Nor I imagine that the Hour is going to happen; and if am brought back to my Lord, surely I will find something better than this as a retreat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and I do not think that the Hour will ever set in. And even if I am returned to my Lord I will surely find a resort better than this.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor do I deem that the Hour (of Judgment) will (ever) come: Even if I am brought back to my Lord, I shall surely find (there) something better in exchange."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And I think not the Hour will ever come, and if indeed I am brought back to my Lord, (on the Day of Resurrection), I surely shall find better than this when I return to Him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Nor do I think that the Hour will come. Even if I returned to my Lord, I should surely find a better place than this'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “And I do not think the Hour is coming. And even if I am returned to my Lord, I will find something better than this in return.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And I do not think the Hour will occur. And even if I should be brought back to my Lord, I will surely find better than this as a return."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:36] Moreover, I do not think that the Hour will ever come; and [even] if I am indeed returned to my Lord, in the Hereafter, according to your claim, I shall surely find better than this as a resort’, as a [place of] return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (I think not that the Hour will ever come) will ever take place, (and if indeed I am brought back unto my Lord) as you claim (I surely shall find better than this) garden (as a resort) as a returning place.
